title: Dune: The Indian behind VFX Oscar for sci-fi epic
description: Namit Malhotra started his company from a garage in Mumbai. Now it's winning Academy Awards.

title: Brazil at work: Black and held back
description: Brazil has one of the largest black and mixed race populations but black people only hold 6% of managerial posts.

title: South Korea: Why so many struggle to sleep
description: Growing numbers of South Koreans suffer from sleep deprivation, with many turning to sleeping pills.

title: Hydra: How German police dismantled Russian darknet site
description: German police say illegal sales on the site amounted to at least £1bn a year

description: The former president can't help ribbing his old deputy on a "good old days" jaunt to the White House.

description: A Ukrainian man has to choose between his family and his country.

description: Russia called footage of bodies in Bucha 'staged' but its evidence for this does not stack up.

description: Revelations of atrocities have added impetus to calls for further measures against Russia's economy.

description: The critically endangered Sumatran rhino gave birth to a female calf in an Indonesian sanctuary.

title: NHS not making progress on early cancer diagnosis
